DOC.brief_summary: Compare operative time complication sacral colpopexy paravaginal repair two-dimensional three-dimensional laparoscopic system .
DOC.brief_title: Laparoscopic Three-dimensional Versus Two-dimensional Sacral Colpopexy Paravaginal Repair
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare operative time laparoscopic sacral colpopexy ( LSC ) treatment symptomatic vaginal vault prolapse well paravaginal repair ( PVR ) symptomatic cystocele two-dimensional three-dimensional laparoscopic system . Additionally study evaluate postoperative complication surgery perform use two-dimensional versus three-dimensional laparoscopic system .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic vaginal vault prolapse ( stage 2 great point C1 pelvic organ prolapse quantification [ POPQ ] grade 2 great BadenWalker half way system ) undergo laparoscopic sacral colpopexy And/Or Symptomatic cystocele ( stage 2 great , point Aa Ba > 1 POPQ grade 2 great BadenWalker half way system ) undergo laparoscopic paravaginal repair Age le 18 year Inability comprehend questionnaire Inability give informed consent return review Vaginal vault prolapse < stage 2 Unable undergo general anesthesia More 5 previous laparotomy Prior sacral colpopexy vaginal mesh prolapse procedure Prior surgery involve retropubic space Vaginal length le 6 cm
